name: hoodie-plugin-email
description: Hoodie plugin that sends multipart emails
readme: Hoodie E-Mail Plugin ====================== Allow your users to send multipart emails, right from the browser. Frontend API: ```js hoodie.email.send({ to: 'joe@example.com', subject: 'Hey ho!', text: 'This is the text version', html: 'I can do HTML, too!' }) ``` Before sending email can be used, you need to configure an email service in pocket.
